keyPolicies.policyDescription: Greens will take action to transform Britain so that it works for everyone. We propose a Britain of us and them' created by the Brexit vote.
David will deliver the radical change needed to confront the climate emergency and provide a Green New Deal.
Greens propose a transformation with a focus on clean energy, better transportation, warmer homes, and creating new jobs.
Greens will give power back to people to decide the way forward with a People’s Vote. Greens would campaign to Remain in the EU for the benefit of everyone.
Support for the NHS and opposition to cuts.

issues.brexitEurope: Only a Green vote will prevent climate chaos, transform Britain whilst remaining in the EU, and elect more Green MPs that you can trust to keep the other parties honest.
issues.environment: For years Greens have led the way on tackling climate chaos. Every vote for the Greens helps speed up climate action.

leaflet.personalStatement: David is known in East Oxford for tireless campaigning on the NHS, the environment, and against austerity.

politicalExperience.achievements: Opposed massive cuts that Tory, Labour and Lib Dems voted through the County Council. Delegate of Oxford Trades Council and a committee member of the Oxford European Movement.

endorsements.endorsement: Only a Green vote will prevent climate chaos, transform Britain whilst remaining in the EU, and elect more Green MPs that you can trust to keep the other parties honest.
